website_summaries.verdict: At 12.6" in diameter, this wheel is effective in aiding with muscle realignment.
pros: An alternative to one-dimensional foam rollers, this wheel is larger than others and creates an intense, deep stretch during yoga and normal stretching routines
Ideal for  relieving lower back tension
We love that it comes with a tutorial as well
cons: Not the best wheel for those on the shorter side

customer_reviews.title: im a big bitch, I have a large chest ...
customer_reviews.text: im a big bitch, I have a large chest,and a back I have to crack bc of the weight of my boobs, it HOLDS MY WEIGHT and along with a roller it helps crack my back on the floor and help me get up it really hold weight if you are over 200 pounds (im 257 currently after an injury) SOLID made and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R. Berger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR BIGGER FOLKS
customer_reviews.text: I am 235 pounds, and this wheel is nice and wide. It holds my weight, and supports my back as I roll back and forth on it. I will absolutely recommend this brand to friends. It seems to be made very well, and does not slip on my carpet. It feels durable and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: This really helped her release some tension and pretty much fixed her back pains within a week ^_^ ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister who had been having some back issues, she was having trouble bending and picking things up. This really helped her release some tension and pretty much fixed her back pains within a week ^_^ she loves it. The product itself is nice and sturdy my sister is 5'2 and is around 135-145lbs she had no trouble putting her weight on it. she did mention it was a little tricky to use at first but nothing a quick youtube tutorial didnt fix ^_^
customer_reviews.author: -Nilyhr65

customer_reviews.title: Great prop but not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice yoga wheel, especially for the price. If you are curious about it but don't know exactly how to use it, there are lots of videos on YouTube. If you are new to yoga and are having trouble with this wheel, don't dispair. You can do backbends and slight inversions using blocks or a bolster, and these methods are a lot more gentle and will enable you to work up to this wheel, which is more advanced. Just as a reference, I'm 5'4" and I have no problem using this wheel, but I am quite flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Little Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: It's Wheely Good...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wish I could say it's just as good as the more widely known Plexus wheel, but can't as I have not tried that one. But as far as I know, this is just as good. Looked up stretching techniques online to make sure I was using it correctly and it helps relieve daily stress on my back. Highly recommended, just take it slow and do your due diligence before using.
customer_reviews.author: S. Feehily

customer_reviews.title: If it's a maybe, lean toward definitely (but see disclosure in case)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to love this, just occasionally wanted to use it. Ended up it's an almost daily use since arrival item. I'm not a person with much back pain, but tightness in the muscles happens to be a different story and for that this is amazing! Disclosure part, I'm just shy of 5'2 and the size of this particular wheel is perfect at my height, significantly taller people may need a wider circumference containing wheel, but I'd prefer they chime in on the truth of that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this wheel. My Chiropractor was the one who turned me onto it. But I shouldve looked aorund more or returned this wheel. As you can see on the foam and plastic, the foam doesnt completely go to the edge of the wheel, so when you do back rolls on it, the plastic digs into your back and is extremely uncofortable. HOWEVER, if the foam just went to the edge of the plastic, this wheel would be perfect. It does the trick, but I cut my stretching short because its uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Zimick

customer_reviews.title: Glad I finally purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this yoga wheel in my cart for a long, long time and finally bit the bullet. I’m not as flexible as I used to be; while that’s not my primary goal in my yoga practice since asanas are only one portion, the inflexibility was limiting my ability to stretch appropriately. This yoga wheel assists in getting me back to a more mobile practice with the support I need and the ability to focus on stretching individual muscle groups slowly. I’m 5’6” and about 205 pounds right now, and it easily held the weight of my entire top half without a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: centrefrenchie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Helps relieve my back pain! I have high back pain that I've had ever since I was a child due to scoliosis. This helps relieve some of that tightness I feel daily. Its not a cure all, sure, but it does help relieve the pain for a little while. I do feel like it should be a little skinnier though so 3 stars for comfort. It isnt uncomfortable by any means.. I just feel like it needs to be a little slimmer. Made very well and sturdy. I was afraid it would slip and make me fall but it stays in place with weight on it!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Miracle tool for healing your back problems!
customer_reviews.text: My sleep, flexibility, posture, and sense of balance all feel improved! Works wonderfully to stretch and align my back whilst massaging out the trigger point knots in your muscles. Sometimes I roll on it, other times I just lay and stretch out for a couple of minutes. The Full Pigeon pose itself is perhaps one of the greatest relieving stretches of all on this baby!
customer_reviews.author: JShel

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT IF YOU HAVE BACK PROBLEMS, WANT TO BE MORE FLEXIBLE, OR JUST WANT TO FEEL...HEAVENLY
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11 and weigh 187 pounds. It doesn't sound like much, but I'm a big dude, and I'm completely inflexible, yet I love this product so much because I work in a very laborious field (I'm a tire warehouse manager), and every evening when I arrive home a take this thing out, sit down on the ground with this thing behind me, begin to roll myself backwards until my head touches the ground, and man is it heavenly. I have sciatica so I always hear the most angelic and relieving pops, and I would even go about saying how this product is absolutely Therapeutic.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: I feel free!
customer_reviews.text: For years I slept curled in a ball & I didn't exercise, it paid a huge toll on my body. After stretching I can breathe & move freely. This is simple but a real life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Fun prop!
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy , I have not checked my weight lately so let’s say I’m in between 105-115lbs? My Khat likes it too but the rubber is starting to loosen the more I use it.
customer_reviews.author: ZeroFox

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: The first couple times using this wheel, hurts. I’m not gonna sugarcoat it. But after you get used to it a little bit, your back certainly starts to feel better after a few days. I’ve dealt with back pain in my entire life, this thing has certainly helped. One of the larger brands offers a “spinal canal“ in the middle. I can see where that is beneficial. All in all, it’s a good product. My back certainly feels more loose than it ever has
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and broke apart during use.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke while using to roll out my back. I’m 6’0” 190lbs in shape. Did not support my weight.
customer_reviews.author: David Root

customer_reviews.title: Foam Not Glued Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because the foam was already coming unglued from the wheel at the seam area. Other than that I'm pleased, is as pictured and sturdy. Will update review if foam comes completely unglued.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful for stretching.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for stretching my back after sitting at a desk all day. It is also helpful to assist in stretch my leg muscles. The mat like grip works well on all floor types, and its very sturdy. I weigh 140 lbs and it holds my weight without issue. I would recommend wearing tight clothes, and having your hair tied back while using it for your back, as it can easily get caught when rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Tschelle

customer_reviews.title: Immediate back pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been having chronic back pain and it was getting so frustrating. I tried an acupressure mat which only helped while I was laying on it. I tried a massage hook which probably made things worse. But this little wheel is amazing. I just received it today and after the first use my back feels so much better and the tight/stiff feeling is much improved. Instantly I could feel all these tiny cracks as I rolled from my mid to upper back. Relief! I’m over 200 lbs and the wheel didn’t bend even a little bit. I will definitely be using this every day and will recommend it to anyone who has back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Expected it to have more give
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be softer like a foam roller. It’s a sturdy wheel that holds my 170lb body well and has good padding and comfortable, but I bought it to pop and massage my back like the chirp wheel shows to do. Not sure if this is how all these wheel products feel and not saying it’s a bad product, just was expecting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing this for awhile now and finally decided to purchase and I'm so glad I did. It stretched my back so well, better than traditional yoga has. Very sturdy and comfortable my only complaint is it's a little larger in diameter than I think I would prefer and the width that you lay on is a little thin so I have to be very slow laying backwards or it can fall over and possibly hurt myself. Even though I say those are complaints they are 100% my own preference and also bc I never used one before I didn't know what to expect. All in all a great product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: I thought I did enough research before purchase. I practiced balancing on the wheel and had difficulty . I finally took a three hour wheel class still had trouble with balance until the instructor had me try her wheel and ta da,balancing was much easier. After class I discussed it with the instructor and she explained how the weight of the wheel can affect stability on the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've bought! my back is very stiff and by rolling with this I'm able to get a deeper stretch than a foam roller . Stretches and opens up my chest. Back feels much more flexible now. I'm on the heavy side and it's able to support my weight.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was SUPER uncomfortable for both my husband and I, so we ended up returning it. I feel like it would work better if the cushion around the wheel went all the way to both edges. When we used it, our backs were pinched by the open area on the sides where the cushion didn't cover the hard plastic. It would probably also work better if the cushion was thicker - it seemed to compress when used so I only felt a very hard plastic pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Lalita

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't do yoga, but I have issues with my back, and I thought this would be a good way to stretch out. But it is very hard, and uncomfortable for me. I was hoping it would have had more cushion. I am keeping it because it is good for when I am sitting and I roll it so I can move my legs. This would great product for someone who does yoga consistently but it is not so great for us older "curvy" gals.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zerillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga companion.
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this prop. It feels great on your back and it works in a way, I don't think nothing could. The great thing about this wheel is that it is just the right size and hardness. It is hard enough to cause things to move and open up yet not too hard that would cause pain or injury. It works on your entire back and affects single vertebrates. I'm doing a little stretch every day in the morning and I feel more energy than ever. With age our backs become stiff and don't bend backwards. This is a age reverse tool for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos E. Taquechel

customer_reviews.title: no customer support
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is way too big for me, so I contacted customer service twice via email and they just ignored me. I need a smaller size, and prefer one with more padding as it's extremely hard. The large size makes it uncomfortable because it makes me arch really high. No one answers emails at this company.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but not just good for back pain
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is great, but it just didn’t live up to its hype. I have a lot of tight muscles in my back that cause pain through the day, and unfortunately it didn’t seem to do much for me at all. I feel like it’s missing something, like a channel for your spine, as it was quite uncomfortable and awkward to roll back on. It looks and feels great, but as a back-relief tool, it doesn’t quite fit my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Cortland Haefele

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching out the back
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the primary user, but everyone in my family who has used it talks about how great they feel after using it. My son said he felt taller, my wife said her lower back pain lessened tremendously. It seems to be very well made, and the diameter of the device is much bigger than the traditional foam roller. I'm not a doctor, so I can't speak to the safety of the device, but it seems like it provides a good stretch in a safe manner. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, for experienced yogi’s.
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to yoga and added this to my practice. It is not for the faint hearted or people who are sensitive. If you’re like me and like deep tissue massages (meaning you can handle the pressure & pain) to get to relief. I don’t think this is for beginners, I should have gotten a smaller wheel with more padding. However, I have gotten use to it and it helps with all back pain. And it didn’t take long for me to enjoy the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: lara e mckee

customer_reviews.title: Check the Size
customer_reviews.text: Ouch. Really uncomfortable, I thought I the right size but I didn't. This would be better if there was a squishy layer over the top instead of just tire tread. However, it is well made, so I gave it three stars. NOTE: If you buy one of these, make sure you buy the appropriate size for you, you might need a smaller or larger one than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Thinker (Works From Home)

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my sacroiliac pain
customer_reviews.text: I have intermittent sacroiliac joint pain, and (due to terrible posture) general back pain. I ordered this and, coincidentally, my sacroiliac pain kicked in while this was shipping. When it was delivered, I opened the box, rolled my back across it, heard 3 little "cracks" from my upper back and one from my lumbar/pelvic area. Like that, the pain was gone! I even feel taller!
customer_reviews.author: ArialM

customer_reviews.title: Soothing but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly I do like rolling my back on this wheel despite having foam rollers. It targets the spine slightly differently. It doesn't crack my back as it does for others, but does provide a good stretch. Wish they would make a spinal ridge in the foam and make the foam thicker. Removing one star because I think these wheels (most brandds on Amazon) are quite expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: The Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I did not know I needed a yoga wheel until I got a yoga wheel. If you suffer from a stiffness and pain in your back, this is perfect for you. It aligns directly with your spin and rolls out tension and knots. This wheel is so much better than a foam roller because it is sturdier and it hits those problem areas where tension tends to hang out.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Joe

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping this would be amazing for stretching out my back
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this would be amazing for stretching out my back, recently pulled it and recovering. Some people said it feels awkward, I was a little suspicious. Turns out it’s not awkward at all. Super easy, done even need balance to use it, feels sooooo good on my back, I use it a few times a day. So so so much better than a foam roller, those are awkward. Already recommending to others
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Faria

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a deal, the quality is cheap. Foam padding and logo started coming undone after a few uses. As a bigger guy, its padding is too thin and uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting more into yoga recently, so I decided to order this in order to work on my flexibility. I tend to have lower back pain and this helps to stretch out my back. I have been able to increase my flexibility and relieve some of the tension that gets stored in my lower back. I went with the largest size and I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wheel for my husband who has been complaining of back pain recently. He loves it! He has been using it at least once daily and has noticed a significant decrease in back pain; he says it's almost resolved. He looked up YouTube videos and finds that using it while on the floor works best for him. I also use it but I'm 5'4" (he's 6'4") and find it easier to use while standing against a wall. I don't really have a lot of back pain but it really does feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Kornika King

customer_reviews.title: I suggest you give it an shot
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised for pain relief... but my husband hated it. It hurt his back, he couldn't roll on it. He doesn't have back pain but I bought it believing it would help him pop his back. Didn't. My daughter uses it for stretching, as a table... for games... lol I don't mind rolling my back on it. It doesn't hurt but it does feel amazing either.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Loredo

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: Here's the deal. The idea behind this is awesome! The problem is the wheel is larger in width than my shoulder blades. It rolls over my shoulders instead of my spine. Im gonna go try a littler wheel with a skinnier base.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Take it slow and watch your balance
customer_reviews.text: I used this a bunch when we first got it. Now I don't need it as often. I contribute this to the therapy this piece provided. Granted, I only had lower back tightness and this loosed that up. It helped my upper back too. It does hold me fairly well at 280 lbs, however, my wife says the shape starts to degrade a little.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I dont see what people are getting out of this.
customer_reviews.text: I feel better lower back relief hanging from a pullup bar. Eventually I'll purchase an inversion bench for my lower back herniated disk (L1). This doesnt help with what a good ole walk through the neighborhood could address. And its not comfortable, i felt it mildly rubbing along the bones of my spine. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: V. Robeiri

customer_reviews.title: The Yoga Wheel: Only 2nd to The Yoga Mat!!
customer_reviews.text: Such an interesting and useful invention... I use it everday for my own exercise positions. I don't use it only for yoga! When I'm sitting down I use it to do side twists, and roll it backwards to further push my obliques to work. I also use it to prop my back up off the floor (weighted legs going straight up) and do upside-down squats. This wheel is wonderful, I'm so glad I bought it as a last minute "oh, what the heck" addition to my cart!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: A perfect addition to my home yoga studio
customer_reviews.text: This wheel makes it possible to work on backbends without having to enlist a second person to assist, and that makes it invaluable! But it's also amazingly sturdy: I've stood on it to do balancing asanas, and it holds my weight with no sense of unsteadiness at all. A really well-designed piece!
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun, good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to simply stretch my neck and shoulder area which is often tight and my posture is rather poor. It was inexpensive and seemed good enough, so i got it without much thought. Once I received it, i saw how sturdy it is and realized all the things you can use it for and it's my new favorite part of my daily stretching and warmup. Where has this been all my life? :)
customer_reviews.author: Buddingtwigs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is fantastic. Gives almost instant relief when it comes to needing to crack your back. My only complaint is that the surface is flat. Some of the other wheels on the market have a rivet down the center so the spine can rest comfortably. All in all though, sturdy, comfortable, and a great temporary back pain reliever.
customer_reviews.author: keck5792

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do that job. I thought it would target the pressure more but the long foam roller is almost the same kind of. This is more like being on a firm ball cuz of the size but it's harder then a firm ball but not uncomfortable cuz the to padding. I Don't have main, more tension around lumbar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian2020

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much a gimmick for my Needs. Just wanted something to stretch out my back but its painful. I will stick to yoga poses, stretching and foam rolling. Decent quality though. Might work for someone else
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: New user but already in love
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine in the mail yesterday and after two times of using it I can already feel my back pain lessening. I carry all of my tension in my spine near my shoulder blades and have had increased pain in the last few weeks. Even though the pain is still pretty tense, its lessening after using this a couple times. I'm optimistic that after a few weeks it'll be close to gone.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Alorro

customer_reviews.title: Seems great for use.
customer_reviews.text: It felt so good to use this to stretch out and crack my back. It hurts the first few times just like the other reviews state. I have sciatica due to desk job but this has definitely helped stretched out my back more than the basic foam roller I have. Seems sturdy for plus size women and my husband who is 6'3.
customer_reviews.author: klp30

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy the name brand back pain wheel but didn’t want to invest so much in it if it didn’t work. It definitely works! I love it. If I’m feeling sore or tweaked my back a little, I lie on this and roll back and forth slowly and it stretches everything out. It’s great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and I’m so glad I bought it. I didn’t realize there’s a weight limit on it. fortunately I fall within the weight limit. I weigh around 250ish and I don’t worry about it cracking or anything like that. But what does crack is my back and I love it. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Love at first roll
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a foam roller for a few months to help stretch my upper back but it wasn’t doing the trick anymore so I found this and because it’s 12” it gives you a better stretch and it feels fantastic. It’s a really great product and I love it
customer_reviews.author: LaurenMaybe

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Really helps my back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have used foam rollers in the pst with some success at relieving my lower back pain. I would say this is like a foam roller on steroids. My back pops so much and it is so satisfying to use. Compared to other brands, this does not have a groove on the center of the wheel, but I h e not found any need or desire to have such a groove. Great value and an awesome alternative to the “popular” brand out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Too big (wheel size), too hard (painful to roll), and slightly too wide for me. I’m 5’9 and 130 LBS so might be perfect for a bigger person with wider shoulders and more body mass to weigh it down. Good quality product - it is being repurposed as a toy for my five year old and he hasn’t been able to crack it yet! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Smile :)

customer_reviews.title: Good product and a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with lower back tightness and knots in my upper back This gives me relief for both I try to use it before playing golf as it loosens everything up before I play. I weigh 230 lbs and I have no issues with how sturdy of feels
customer_reviews.author: huthuthut

customer_reviews.title: I feel like my blood is vibrating through my body
customer_reviews.text: Life changing. Been using every night before bed for tight hip flexors, quads, hamstrings and back. When I lay down to go to sleep, I feel like my blood is vibrating through my body. I'm able to relax, and I'm sleeping like a rock. I am in love with this!
customer_reviews.author: feebs

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Back
customer_reviews.text: This has been incredibly helpful to my back. I use it regularly and it often cracks my back and additionally helps with stretching and core strength at the same time. I weigh about 235 lb and it has no problem supporting me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with extreme back pain every morning. I decided to buy this after many YouTube videos I watched and it worked like a gem. It popped my back the first time I used it and relieved my back pain right away. It was definitley worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Yoly L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: I know lots of people use these wheels for pain relief- I just don't get the relief others do with the wheel. I bought it to deepen my stretches and to enable me to stretch my back in another direction. It is a nice, sturdy wheel and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: chica

customer_reviews.title: Back stretch
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I have no complaints. I wanted something to stretch my back for pain relief. By golly I have found it! I initially ordered to help my child with re-training for gymnastics but decided for price figure we both could use. Now, may need to set timers because all the kids wanted to use for stretching. I like the passing and stability. I am a thicker women and was worried about my weight and using it.
customer_reviews.author: CHIEFROKA915A

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this. Relieves back stiffness, pain.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiancé. His backs been bothering him from sitting at his desk all day working. He’s really enjoying this, it supports his weight ( 205lbs ) and he’s able to stretch and pop his back. Great buy, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Anazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been going rolling for years but am having issues with my T spine. Massage therapist recommended stretching my chest more and found this. It’s a god-send. I use it a few times a day and it has increased my flexibility and decreased my pain. Now husband and kids are on it so may need another. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Living my best life

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga prop!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this yoga wheel. It helps deepen backbends and provide a great use when stretching my hamstrings.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Running Recovery Prop!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing these in the yoga studio, I decided I had to have one for my yoga collection. I'm 5'6 and it works great for me. I am an ultra runner and triathlete so my muscles (and my back!) are always super tight. This will help me to stretch my back more than anything else I own. Only disappointment was that it didn't come with the pose card, as promised, but hey, that's what pinterest is for!
customer_reviews.author: RunsOnVeggies

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man in my 40's and weight 200 (ish) pounds. Holds me up and helps me stretch. Too soon to know if it will help long term, but the first 3-4 days have been moderate relief of my chronic mid-back pain.
customer_reviews.author: dugroz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for back alignment
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel, but I wish I would have purchased the 5" one instead. This one will give you a nice stretch, and may even help to pop your back...but if you're looking for something to get deeper into your neck area this won't do it. It's a great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Dillingers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but doesn’t help me.
customer_reviews.text: Saw the info commercial and decided to give this thing a try. Doesn’t do crap for me. But maybe my problems are not effected by this thing. It is sturdy and well made. Just doesn’t help me.
customer_reviews.author: joey lsell

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain
customer_reviews.text: It takes some getting the hang of using. Once you get the hang of it. Does help with lower back pain and stretches the back muscles. I haven’t tried the other workout yet. Just mainly use it for back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: Omg!! 😱
customer_reviews.text: The back cracker!!! This thing is a god send 😭. I’m only 29 and about 220lbs, but the first time I got on it everything just *CracK* *craCk* *crAck* crackED LoL 😆. It’s sturdy, solid, and it works!!! 👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: That awesome girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mister and he loves it! He’s a back-cracker and this does easily what I can only do by standing on his back. He was a bit skeptical about this wheel being able to support his weight: ~ 260 lbs, but it’s sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Super sturdy, just the right amount of foam padding, and pretty lightweight. Works wonders for rolling out your back. Definitely recommend this cheaper version compared to the $40 wheels. Why pay more when this one is all you need?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: After a big accident, I suffer from continual back pain. I often wake up and don’t seem to get a good sleep. Since finding this yoga wheel, I stretch every night before bed. I find that I sleep better, with less wake ups, and find my back feeling much more relaxed through the day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I am 5 2 , 135 lbs. I have a regular foam roller but this yoga roller is way better for stretching your back. It actually cracks my back It’s sturdy the the material is great. It also helps a lot with my yoga back band and gain some flexibility. Great price and super fast shipping. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lolaray

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, used it twice and I love it already! I have been using chairs and stairs to crack my back and get relief. I have gone to a chiropractor to get the same effect that this wheel gives me. Thanks for making a great product that is reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy feeling for me. 135 lbs. 5'6. Use for my back as a reset/stabilizer Best used in combination with other stretches and physical activity. Great color and feels safe/ clean
customer_reviews.author: JK kitties

customer_reviews.title: Effective but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This works for popping your back, but not if it’s up closer to your neck. Also I don’t know what kind of massage techniques some folks are into but this definitely feels closer to a beating than a massage.
customer_reviews.author: crys_w56

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy helped my back right away.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended and aggressive doam eillwr. I picked this and it helps with a muscle pain right away. It is VERY sturdy but hardwr to use than a doam roller. I would not like to use this in front of an audience.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 285 and this product holds me very easily. I can hear and feel my joints releasing as I roll on this. I gave it a 3 for comfort which is not the products fault, but these wheels are just not comfortable; they work, but it can be slightly painful by design.
customer_reviews.author: Christians walker

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has had a lot of back pain lately. He was very skeptical at first but the first time he used it his back popped 8 times! He said it did hurt a little bit afterwards but that went away within the hour. He now uses it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T.

customer_reviews.title: Stiff back!
customer_reviews.text: i work at a desk job 12 hours a day. Sometimes I hunched over for 10 hours. Haha. This is a great tool to relieve my back pain and stiff back. Sometimes I just lay on it while watching tv with out even realizing I’m stretching! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The first time I used it (after warming up some first) my back cracked 3 times and then 2 times more after. Since then, every time I use it I can stretch further and my back feels great. It is strong. I am 5’10’ and 200 lbs and the wheel fits good. My son, who is 6’2” and weighs a solid 260 says he wished it was a little wider for his back. It does feel a little hard when using for the leg balances but then it might just be me who is not used to it yet. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Its fantastic! For me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this and I have moderate to severe back-pain pretty much 24-7. This has helped....I don't want to say alleviate the pain but for sure it has helped me be able to function easier. I would still 100% recommend speaking with your doctor before purchasing any product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly. It's like having your kid walk on your back and hitting all the sore spots. It helped immensely to relieve soreness after heavy lifting for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Cailea Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great for yoga and back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice yoga wheel. It also help with my back pain. It’s really well made. I’ve only had it a week. So far so good. As of now I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool to Alleviate Back Discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Though I can’t tell you how this works for yoga, I can tell you it works the kinks out of my spine after a long day if sitting at my desk. Wish I’d gotten a narrower wheel to fit better between my shoulder blades. It would be a better fit width-wise for average-height to tall people. This wheel is perfect for my needs otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first yoga wheel and I love it. Its not super heavy so it doesn't hurt when I hit myself or fall off haha. Pretty durable so far, had it and been using it a week, and I can't keep off of it
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Little effort = big payoff!!
customer_reviews.text: If you use product for 5 minutes 2/3 times a week it will change your life. It’s help decompress and stretch parts of my back that I don’t think were ever stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Mehani

customer_reviews.title: I use this product to crack my back.
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with suggestions on how to employ very complicated Pilates style moves. I just use it to crack my back and it works perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: Friend of Penguin

customer_reviews.title: This feels so good! I use it to roll and stretch on ...
customer_reviews.text: This feels so good! I use it to roll and stretch on my back while I watch tv. I don't do any cool yoga poses or anything. I just bought it to stretch out and manage back pain, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: escapethevillage

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night to stretch and align my back. It works well for me. I am a big boy 295lbs and it has no problem handling the bulk. I had others that tried to flatten out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, pay attention to diameter
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for my back! Just pay attention when you buy one to the size, I probably should have started out with one a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Dynette

customer_reviews.title: Big and Tall friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tall guy and have back pain from a world built for shorter people. This worked on the first go. My back pooped all the way up. And saved me a visit to the chiropractor. I'll try to do reset of the excereiced this is made for to strength my back.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It works for back pain
customer_reviews.text: This really makes a difference rolling on my spine. It does hurt just like the chiropractor. It’s fairly sturdy but sometimes it feels a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Stretches your back
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully for stretching the back. Make sure you are flexible enough to use it or start slowly to gain flexibility. Very study and holds up well with use.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbiesforfun

customer_reviews.title: No pain No gain!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped alleviate a lot of back pain! It was kind of hard in the beginning when my back was sore and tight, but my back popped 12 times the first time I used it. Using it daily has given me a lot more flexibility in my back with less pain.
customer_reviews.author: MelaMang75

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 1st Yoga Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this already. I've only used it for a few poses, mainly to stretch my back before I start incorporating it into my amateur yoga practice. This is seriously great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: good for spine stretching and tension release
customer_reviews.text: This wheel helped me when i was in sciatic pain. The stretching was painful, but ultimately beneficial. Now I use it to release tension in my back in the evenings. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Laser

customer_reviews.title: Weight limit is MUCH lower than stated.
customer_reviews.text: It broke. Description says max weight supported is 330lbs. My husband isn’t even 300 lbs.... I’ll be returning this item... but while it lasted, it was great for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousJo

customer_reviews.title: Start Slow
customer_reviews.text: As a bit of a bigger guy, I started using this in the mornings and rolling over it directly on the floor puts a pretty good amount of pressure on your lower back if you put all your weight on it. Just ease into it and you'll be fine. I'm 230 and I don't feel at all like it's going to bend or not be able to hold me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S. George

customer_reviews.title: Go slow. It can be a little intense at first if your not used to stretching that far.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been watching this item for a while and finally have in. Love it. I use t for yoga but my husband uses it when his back it tight from work and it makes him feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Jarrett

product_meta.title: REEHUT Yoga Wheel for Back Pain - 12.6" x 5" Strong Premium Back Roller and Stretcher with Thick Cushion for Dharma Yoga Pose, Backbend & Stretching
feature_bullets: STRETCHABLE: The yoga wheel can stretch the ligament and relax the shoulder massage; it fits the curve of the back and is suitable for stretching the back.
COMFORTABLE: Yoga wheel features a hybrid TPE foam which cushions your palms, feet, and back while in motion, providing a remarkable sense of comfort.
DURABLE: TPE plastic inner which effectively improves the impact resistance and is safer to use; the maximum able to withstand a WHOPPING 330 lbs!

ANTI-SLIP: Free of moisture accumulation, thanks to its superior padding, you can use your new prop during the most demanding of yoga sessions!Imitation leaf vein pattern is more anti-slip; meanwhile this kind of material is easy to clean.

Package Includes: 1 - Reehut Yoga 12.6" diameter, 5" wide stretching wheel with an ebook. ATTENTION, please ask for the CUSTOMER SERVICE if you have not received it in two days after the product is shipped

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
